channel.title: Moronfoluwa Akintola
channel.description: The home page of Moronfoluwa Akintola, My name is Moronfoluwa Akintola, A FullStack Javascript Engineer. I use ExpressJS, Node and MongoDB. I also have knowledge of Google Cloud. I currently live in Ibadan, Nigeria. I have been writing Software for 2+ years professionally. intending to hire? view my resume "

item.title: I Hate CSS
item.description: Those of you who design webpages have probably seen this rant before. In fact, if you search google for “I Hate CSS” you will find. lots. of. results. Still, I need to rant a bit.
